mapper.select: select rawid as measure_trx_id, param_mst_rawid as param_id, data_type_cd, max_freq as end_freq, freq_count as spectra_line, rpm, sampling_time, event_dtts as measure_dtts, reserved_col1, reserved_col2, reserved_col3, reserved_col4, reserved_col5, binary_data as binary from trace_raw_trx_pdm where data_type_cd = #{data_type} and trace_trx_rawid = #{measure_trx_id}

SELECT trace_raw.param_mst_rawid AS param_id, param.name, trace_raw.rpm, trace_raw.event_dtts AS measure_dtts FROM trace_raw_trx_pdm trace_raw, param_mst_pdm param WHERE trace_raw.trace_trx_rawid =#{measure_trx_id} and trace_raw.param_mst_rawid = param.rawid and trace_raw.data_type_cd='F'

select * from trace_trx_pdm where measure_trx_id = ( select max(d.measure_trx_id) as measure_trx_id from trace_trx_pdm a join param_pdm b on b.param_id = a.param_id join health_model_pdm c on b.eqp_id = c.eqp_id join trace_trx_pdm d on d.param_id = a.param_id where d.measure_dtts >= c.start_dtts and d.measure_dtts < c.end_dtts and a.measure_trx_id = #{measure_trx_id} )

select rawid as measure_trx_id, a.event_dtts as measure_dtts from trace_trx_pdm a, ( select distinct trace_trx_rawid from trace_raw_trx_pdm where event_dtts >= #{start} and event_dtts < #{end} and param_mst_rawid = #{param_id} and trace_trx_rawid is not null and data_type_cd ='F' ) b where a.rawid = b.trace_trx_rawid order by event_dtts

select rawid as measure_trx_id, param_mst_rawid as param_id, data_type_cd, max_freq as end_freq, freq_count as spectra_line, rpm, sampling_time, event_dtts as measure_dtts, reserved_col1, reserved_col2, reserved_col3, reserved_col4, reserved_col5
from trace_raw_trx_pdm where trace_trx_rawid = #{measure_trx_id} and data_type_cd = 'F'

select trace_trx_rawid as measure_trx_id, param_mst_rawid as param_id, data_type_cd, max_freq as end_freq, freq_count as spectra_line, rpm, sampling_time, event_dtts as measure_dtts, reserved_col1, reserved_col2, reserved_col3, reserved_col4, reserved_col5
from trace_raw_trx_pdm where event_dtts >= #{start} and event_dtts < #{end}

select trace_trx_rawid as measure_trx_id, param_mst_rawid as param_id, data_type_cd, max_freq as end_freq, freq_count as spectra_line, rpm, sampling_time, event_dtts as measure_dtts, reserved_col1, reserved_col2, reserved_col3, reserved_col4, reserved_col5
from trace_raw_trx_pdm where trace_trx_rawid=#{measure_trx_id} and data_type_cd = 'F'

SELECT RAWID, PARAM_MST_RAWID, TRACE_TRX_RAWID, DATA_TYPE_CD, MAX_FREQ, FREQ_COUNT, RPM, SAMPLING_TIME, EVENT_DTTS, RESERVED_COL1, RESERVED_COL2, RESERVED_COL3, RESERVED_COL4, RESERVED_COL5 FROM trace_raw_trx_pdm, ( select * from ( SELECT meas.event_dtts specout_date FROM trace_raw_trx_pdm meas, ( SELECT trx.param_mst_rawid, trx.event_dtts FROM trace_trx_pdm trx, trace_spec_mst_pdm spec WHERE trx.param_mst_rawid =#{param_id} AND trx.param_mst_rawid = spec.param_mst_rawid AND trx.event_dtts >= #{start} AND trx.event_dtts < #{end} AND trx.value > case when trx.warning_spec is not null then trx.warning_spec - abs ( trx.warning_spec ) * ( 1- #{rate} ) else spec.warning_spec -abs(spec.warning_spec)*(1-#{rate}) end ) specout WHERE meas.param_mst_rawid = specout.param_mst_rawid AND meas.event_dtts >= specout.event_dtts AND meas.event_dtts < #{end} ) zzz limit 2 ) specout_date_data WHERE trace_raw_trx_pdm.param_mst_rawid = #{param_id} AND trace_raw_trx_pdm.event_dtts = specout_date_data.specout_date ORDER BY event_dtts

select a.*, b.scale_factor, b.binary, b.binary blob from sample_trace_raw_trx_pdm a join sample_trace_raw_trx_bin_pdm b on a.measure_trx_id = b.measure_trx_id where b.bin_data_type = #{data_type} and b.measure_trx_id = #{measure_trx_id}

select rawid, problem_data_rawid, measure_trx_id, to_timestamp(concat('1970-01-01',measure_dtts)), value, end_freq, spectra_line, rpm from ( select * from ( select rawid, problem_data_rawid, measure_trx_id, to_char(measure_dtts, 'hh24:mi:ss') as measure_dtts, value, end_freq, spectra_line, rpm from sample_trace_raw_trx_pdm where problem_data_rawid= #{sampleRawId} ) where measure_dtts >= to_char(systimestamp,'hh24:mi:ss') order by measure_dtts ) where rownum=1

select rawid, problem_data_rawid, measure_trx_id, to_timestamp(concat('1970-01-01',measure_dtts)), value, end_freq, spectra_line, rpm from ( select * from ( select rawid, problem_data_rawid, measure_trx_id, to_char(measure_dtts, 'hh24:mi:ss') as measure_dtts, value, end_freq, spectra_line, rpm from sample_trace_raw_trx_pdm where problem_data_rawid= #{sampleRawId} ) where measure_dtts < to_char(systimestamp,'hh24:mi:ss') order by measure_dtts desc ) where rownum=1
